channel.title: Microsoft Developer Blogs
channel.description: Get the latest information, insights, announcements, and news from Microsoft.

item.title: 【The case of the crash when destructing a std::map】破坏 std::map 时崩溃的情况
item.description: 【Who is corrupting the map?】谁在破坏地图？

item.title: 【Effectively building Linux apps with Microsoft Dev Box and WSL】使用 Microsoft Dev Box 和 WSL 有效构建 Linux 应用程序
item.description: 【Developers cherish nothing more than the environments they use every day to build apps. These environments have to be configured just right, with the tools they need for day-to-day tasks, and even the details like the size of the point mouse. One thing is certain, when you don’t have enough flexibility and control over their […]】开发人员最珍惜的就是他们每天用来构建应用程序的环境。这些环境必须配置得恰到好处，包括日常任务所需的工具，甚至是鼠标大小等细节。有一点是肯定的，当你没有足够的灵活性和控制他们的[...]

item.title: 【SK Python Kernel Reaches 1,000,000 downloads】SK Python 内核下载量突破 1,000,000 次
item.description: 【We are thrilled to announce that Microsoft Semantic Kernel Python Kernel has reached an incredible milestone of 1,000,000 downloads! This achievement would not have been possible without the unwavering support and enthusiasm of our community. We want to extend our heartfelt thanks to every developer, contributor, and user who has embraced the Python Kernel, providing […]】我们很高兴地宣布 Microsoft Semantic Kernel Python Kernel 已达到 1,000,000 次下载的令人难以置信的里程碑！如果没有我们社区坚定不移的支持和热情，这一成就是不可能实现的。我们要向每一位拥抱 Python 内核的开发者、贡献者和用户表示衷心的感谢，他们提供了 [...]

item.title: 【Announcing Semantic Kernel for Java 1.3.0】宣布推出 Java 语义内核 1.3.0
item.description: 【Hello again Java AI developers! We are announcing the 1.3.0 release of the Semantic Kernel for Java. You can find our updates on the GitHub repository and the artifacts on Maven Central. This release will mark the final experimental version of our Vector Store functionality. Vector search is now available across all our supported vector stores. We’ve implemented approximate search […]】Java AI 开发者们大家好！我们宣布推出 Java 语义内核 1.3.0 版本。您可以在 GitHub 存储库上找到我们的更新，并在 Maven Central 上找到我们的工件。此版本将标志着我们的矢量存储功能的最终实验版本。现在，我们所有支持的矢量商店都提供矢量搜索。我们已经实现了近似搜索[...]

item.title: 【Azure SDK Release (September 2024)】Azure SDK 版本（2024 年 9 月）
item.description: 【The Azure SDKs release every month. This post includes the month's highlights and release notes.】Azure SDK 每月发布一次。这篇文章包括本月的亮点和发行说明。

item.title: 【Effortless Instrumentation profiling with Persistent Target Selection】通过持续目标选择轻松进行仪器分析
item.description: 【Ever wished to assess your code’s performance without repeatedly choosing the target process or executable for each instrumentation profiling session? If so, you’re among many developers who find this task cumbersome and prone to errors, especially when profiling the same target repeatedly. We understand your frustration and have a solution: Visual Studio 2022 introduces a […]】是否曾经希望评估代码的性能，而无需为每个仪器分析会话重复选择目标进程或可执行文件？如果是这样，您就是许多开发人员中的一员，他们发现此任务很麻烦并且容易出错，尤其是在重复分析同一目标时。我们理解您的挫败感并提供了解决方案：Visual Studio 2022 引入了 [...]

item.title: 【Visual Studio at Unreal Fest Seattle 2024】Visual Studio 参加 2024 年西雅图虚幻音乐节
item.description: 【Join us in-person at Unreal Fest Seattle 2024 with an in-depth look at how Visual Studio and GitHub Copilot can help modernize your Unreal Engine game development. Session Title: Modernizing Game Development with Visual Studio and AI Session Info: October 3rd, 2024, 2:00 PM-3:00 PM Pacific Time | Room 445 Abstract: Join Microsoft to learn […]】亲自参加 2024 年西雅图 Unreal Fest，深入了解 Visual Studio 和 GitHub Copilot 如何帮助您实现虚幻引擎游戏开发的现代化。会议标题：利用 Visual Studio 和 AI 实现游戏开发现代化会议信息：太平洋时间 2024 年 10 月 3 日下午 2:00 至下午 3:00 445 室摘要：加入 Microsoft 学习 [...]

item.title: 【Introducing seamless authentication with Power Pages and Microsoft Entra External ID】引入使用 Power Pages 和 Microsoft Entra 外部 ID 的无缝身份验证
item.description: 【Announcing the public preview of Microsoft Entra External ID as an identity provider for Microsoft Power Pages, streamlining authentication for your external-facing apps. With Power Pages, you can launch a website in minutes, and External ID provides robust tools to secure external identities, with extensive customization options available.】宣布推出 Microsoft Entra 外部 ID 的公共预览版，作为 Microsoft Power Pages 的身份提供程序，简化面向外部的应用程序的身份验证。借助 Power Pages，您可以在几分钟内启动网站，而外部 ID 提供强大的工具来保护外部身份，并提供广泛的自定义选项。

item.title: 【Pulling a single item from a C++ parameter pack by its index, remarks】按索引从 C++ 参数包中提取单个项目，备注
item.description: 【Why such a complicated way to pull the type from the pack?】为什么要采用如此复杂的方式从包中提取类型？

item.title: 【Announcing the General Availability (GA) of Native Authentication for Microsoft Entra External ID】宣布 Microsoft Entra 外部 ID 的本机身份验证全面可用 (GA)
item.description: 【Introducing the General Availability (GA) of Native Authentication for Microsoft Entra External ID! A feature that allows you to design and control the sign-in experience within your mobile apps.】Microsoft Entra 外部 ID 的本机身份验证正式发布 (GA)！该功能允许您设计和控制移动应用程序中的登录体验。
